text: Jason Jon Jiménez (born January 10, 1976) is a former Major League Baseball pitcher. Jimenez, who is of Mexican descent, made his Major League Baseball debut on June 3, 2002. He pitched in five games for the Tampa Bay Devil Rays and one game for the Detroit Tigers. ==References== ==External links== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Baseball players from California Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:American baseball players of Mexican descent Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Tampa Bay Devil Rays players
title: Jason Jiménez
